Classic Nintendo GameCube games are coming exclusively to #NintendoSwitch2 for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members! #NintendoDirect 

►The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker 
►SOULCALIBUR II 
►F-Zero GX
